name: Into the Darkness (0zanM)
description:
You are living in your apartment but something is different and going to work;

You are working in a hospital as a guard,

One of the prisoners escaped from cell and you are trying to enter the lobby to call security but he is attacking to you and you are trying to enter the lobby without dying.

Controls :

W-A-S-D to move

E to interact

F to turn on/off your flashlight

SPACE to jump
